Class InternshipOpportunity

java.lang.Object
InternshipOpportunity
public class InternshipOpportunity extends Object
Represents an internship opportunity created by a company representative.

    • InternshipOpportunity

      public InternshipOpportunity(String opportunityID, String title, String description, String level, String preferredMajor, Date openingDate, Date closingDate, int maxSlots, double minGPA, CompanyRepresentative createdBy)
      Constructs an InternshipOpportunity.
      Parameters:
      opportunityID - the unique ID
      title - the title
      description - the description
      level - the level
      preferredMajor - the preferred major
      openingDate - the opening date
      closingDate - the closing date
      maxSlots - the max slots
      minGPA - the min GPA
      createdBy - the creator
